channel.title: Mobility on Baltic Security Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Mobility on Baltic Security Foundation

item.title: Transatlantic Security Exchange
item.description: The Baltic Security Foundation has launched the Transatlantic Security Exchange. The program brings together experts and researchers from Europe and America to focus on further studies of Baltic security in regional and international context.

item.title: Texas A&M University Students Participate in BSF Young Leaders Mobility Program
item.description: In October 2019, Baltic Security Foundation hosted Master of International Affairs students from Texas A&M University’s Bush School of Government and Public Service for the Young Leaders Mobility Program in Rīga.
